clean_content:
Definition / general

* Rare* Usually age 20 or less* Benign, rarely recurs

Radiology description

* Variable radiolucent - radiopaque appearance

Microscopic (histologic) description

* Small islands and cords of markedly attenuated ameloblastic epithelium two cells thick within dense collagenous stroma that is often immature* Occasional dentin or cementum production and stellate reticulum* Also granular cell variant

Microscopic (histologic) images

Contributed by Kelly Magliocca, D.D.S., M.P.H.  

[![Ameloblastic fibroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandiblemaxillawhoMagliocca12.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandiblemaxillawhoMagliocca12.jpg)

Ameloblastic fibroma

[![Odontogenic islands with cystic change, within immature mesenchymal stroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca03.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca03.jpg)
 
[![Odontogenic islands with cystic change, within immature mesenchymal stroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca05.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca05.jpg)
 
[![Odontogenic islands with cystic change, within immature mesenchymal stroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca06.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca06.jpg)

Odontogenic islands with cystic change, within immature mesenchymal stroma

  

[![AF at scanning magnification](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca01.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca01.jpg)

AF at scanning magnification

[![Odontogenic islands](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca02.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca02.jpg)

Odontogenic islands

[![Odontogenic cords within immature mesenchymal stroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca04.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca04.jpg)
 
[![Odontogenic cords within immature mesenchymal stroma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca07.jpg)](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/imgau/mandibleameloblasticfibromamagliocca07.jpg)

Odontogenic cords within immature mesenchymal stroma

Differential diagnosis

* [Ameloblastoma](https://www.pathologyoutlines.com/topic/mandiblemaxillaameloblastoma.html): no connective tissue stroma, has dentin and enamel
